posts.post_content:
I have these two baseball cdvs available.  The first is described by Mark Rucker as the "Brandywine Nine" circa 1868. Another copy of this cdv is pictured on pg 32 of Rucker's Baseball Cartes book.  $1750.
The second cdv is circa 1880 and pictures a team with NW on their jereys and lots of equipment.  $1000.
I have a few others available.  Please email at [url]garypass57@yahoo.com[/url].
One more addition.  This is a circa 1875 team taken in South Bend In.  Interesting team with a photo bomber in the background. $1750.
Brandywine has gone to auction.  The other two are still available.  Will listen to offers.  Thanks.
Last day for offers.  Will move to ebay this week.
